thread.title: Cops: 90-year-old woman shot husband in back
thread.title_full: Cops: 90-year-old woman shot husband in back

author: Raisa Habersham
title: Cops: 90-year-old woman shot husband in back
text:
An elderly coupleâ€™s argument led to the 90-year-old wife shooting her 87-year-old husband in the back, according to a report.
Emma Walton allegedly shot her husband Saturday at a home in Albany, WALB-TV reported.
The two had gotten into an argument, which escalated and led to the shooting, the report said.
She faces aggravated assault charges. The husband was treated and released from a hospital.
Read more of the story here.
In other news:
Burger King Owner Purchases Popeyes
